item.title: @elonmusk: Join me as we announce a record-breaking $20 billion investment in our state. Mississippi has moment...

item.title: @elonmusk: Grok Voice Mode gives you a variety of voice options: • Ara – Upbeat Female • Eve – Soft, Soothing F...
item.description: Grok Voice Mode gives you a variety of voice options: • Ara – Upbeat Female • Eve – Soft, Soothing Female • Leo – Polished British Male • Rex – Calm, Steady Male • Sal – Smooth, Warm Male • Gork – Relaxed, Laid-back Male Just open the settings icon to pick your voice. You can also adjust the speaking speed to your liking.

item.title: @elonmusk: My friend was hiking uphill in New Zealand with no network coverage and still was able to send his m...
item.description: My friend was hiking uphill in New Zealand with no network coverage and still was able to send his mom a text using SpaceX satellite connectivity. Imagine how many lives this can save. Starlink is saving lives. ❤️

item.title: @elonmusk: Harvey was suffocated to death at his Minnesota daycare. 0 national outrage.
item.description: Harvey was suffocated to death at his Minnesota daycare. 0 national outrage.

item.title: @elonmusk: Our officer was ambushed and beaten with snow shovels and broom handles. This was an attempted murde...
item.description: Our officer was ambushed and beaten with snow shovels and broom handles. This was an attempted murder of federal law enforcement. The details that@CNNis too afraid to address here is: all three of the illegal aliens involved in last night’s violent attack on law enforcement were let into our country by the Biden administration.

item.title: @elonmusk: HEARTBREAKING: Harvey Mucklebust's grandmother speaks after the 11-month-old was suffocated to death...
item.description: HEARTBREAKING: Harvey Mucklebust's grandmother speaks after the 11-month-old was suffocated to death at a daycare: "Every day, we will say your name. Every day, we will continue to fight for you. And in the end, we will make sure that justice has been served." JUSTICE FOR HARVEY

item.title: @elonmusk: Once again, Tesla tops the charts for vehicle safety According to Euro NCAP: • Tesla Model 3 — Best ...
item.description: Once again, Tesla tops the charts for vehicle safety According to Euro NCAP: • Tesla Model 3 — Best in Class: Large Family Car • Tesla Model Y — Best in Class: Small SUV Both earned top scores in Safety Assist and Occupant Protection Tesla keeps safety as its first priority and once again leads the industry where it matters most: protecting people and saving lives

item.title: @elonmusk: WEAPONIZATION: RINOs in Congress overruled the president to fund the anti-America, anti-Free Speech ...
item.description: WEAPONIZATION: RINOs in Congress overruled the president to fund the anti-America, anti-Free Speech NGO called the National Endowment for Democracy (NED). Its CEO, Damon Wilson, makes more than the president and his husband runs a government-funded hair salon in Washington DC. Why do taxpayers need to support every grifting Democrat and their pet NGOs?

item.title: @elonmusk: If you are the founder of a highly valued illiquid startup, set some time aside and read this entire...
item.description: If you are the founder of a highly valued illiquid startup, set some time aside and read this entire article. The act is designed to bankrupt you and to personally punish any appraiser or accountant who disagrees.

item.title: @elonmusk: Reminder than San Francisco County could halve its budget from $16B to $8B and still be the best-fun...
item.description: Reminder than San Francisco County could halve its budget from $16B to $8B and still be the best-funded major county in the USA. Services are just bad bc of endemic corruption. Saikat is either lying or stupid.
